The Muslim Brotherhood issued a statement following the speech reiterating demands for Mubarak's resignation and saying it was time for the military to intervene.<ref>{{cite web | url=http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-middle-east-12307698 | title=Live: Egypt unrest | accessdate=29 January 2011 | date=28 January 2011 | publisher=BBC News Online | archivedate=29 January 2011 | archiveurl=http://www.webcitation.org/5w5dpTRTE | quote="Mubarak must step down. It is time for the military to intervene and save the country"}}</ref>
